title: Update homepage hero message with provided quote

requirements.text: Replace the existing hero message text on the homepage with the exact user-provided quote: “I love you with all my hearts, and i am proud of you who you are!!”.

quotes: Just write “I love you with all my hearts, and i am proud of you who you are!!”

acceptanceCriteria: In the hero section message area (currently showing “Every moment with you is a beautiful memory in the making”), the displayed text is exactly: “I love you with all my hearts, and i am proud of you who you are!!”.
The updated quote appears in both light and dark mode with the existing styling (italic, centered, romantic theme) preserved.
No backend changes are required to display the updated quote.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Adding edit controls or admin UI to change the message from the browser.
Persisting the message in the backend or adding any new backend APIs.
